sentences.en: But the flesh - and - blood actors also got to romp on the pyramids.
sentences.cn: 但是真人演员也在金字塔拍摄的很过瘾.

sentences.en: He was on song in the romp over their rivals.
sentences.cn: 他在最佳状态中大胜对手.

sentences.en: I can't turn around here in Shaanxi and head west for a romp in Qinghai.
sentences.cn: 我不能从陕西回头再去逛青海.

sentences.en: It's a hard course: very few students romp through.
sentences.cn: 那门课程很难,很少学生能轻易通过.

sentences.en: Kids just love being able to romp around in the fresh air without having to wrap up warm.
sentences.cn: 孩子们非常喜欢不用裹着厚实的衣服在空气新鲜的户外嬉闹。

sentences.en: Liz do not enjoy romp as much as other girls do.
sentences.cn: 莉丝不像别的女孩那样喜欢嬉戏吵闹.

sentences.en: Prepare yourself for a Dickensian romp complete with snow, street urchins and gentlemen in waistcoats.
sentences.cn: 准备好迎接狄更生式的,包含积雪 、 街头顽童和穿着马甲的绅士的轻松情节.

sentences.en: She was a hundred flowers bloom, Tianchi in the water, to romp down the mountain.
sentences.cn: 百花为她盛开了, 天池里的水, 欢蹦乱跳地流下了山.

sentences.en: The child went for a romp in the forest.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子去森林快活一把.

sentences.en: The horse won in a romp.
They forecast that Mr Powell would romp home in the expected October election.
sentences.cn: 他们预计,鲍威尔先生会在预期十月份举行的竞选中轻易获胜.

sentences.en: This is easy stuff , we'll romp through this.
sentences.cn: 这很容易, 我们轻而易举便能做好.

trans.tran_cn: 顽皮嬉闹，玩闹，顽童，轻易取得的胜利
嬉笑玩闹，欢快地迅速奔跑，[俚]轻易地取胜，不费力地完成
